snippet: The government has said that the students were hauled off buses by corrupt local police officers in the southern city of Iguala and handed over to a drug gang.
abstract: Bone fragment of missing Mexican student is found, only second to be identified out of 43 students government claims were killed in 2014 by drug gang after being kidnapped by police; outside panel disputes theory that students were cremated at site where fragments turned up.
lead_paragraph: The government has said that the students were hauled off buses by corrupt local police officers in the southern city of Iguala and handed over to a drug gang.

headline.print_headline: The Americas; Mexico: 2nd Missing Student Identified

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Escuela Normal Rural Raul Isidro Burgos (Guerrero, Mexico)
